description:
In http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/devref/filter_scheduler.html

The second "ServerGroupAntiAffinityFilter" should be "ServerGroupAffinityFilter"

"ServerGroupAntiAffinityFilter - This filter works the same way as ServerGroupAntiAffinityFilter. The difference is that when you create the server group, you should specify a policy of ‘affinity’."
title: Filter class ServerGroupAntiAffinityFilter defined twice

comments.content:
In http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/devref/filter_scheduler.html

The second "ServerGroupAntiAffinityFilter" should be "ServerGroupAffinityFilter"

"ServerGroupAntiAffinityFilter - This filter works the same way as ServerGroupAntiAffinityFilter. The difference is that when you create the server group, you should specify a policy of ‘affinity’."
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yeungp

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/116356
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/116356
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=ea86e31a0c714b7ef37ecf0833222c1529b32258
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit ea86e31a0c714b7ef37ecf0833222c1529b32258
Author: Andreas Jaeger <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Aug 22 20:21:32 2014 +0200

    Fix class name for ServerGroupAffinityFilter
    
    The class name for ServerGroupAffinityFilter is
    ServerGroupAffinityFilter and not ServerGroupAntiAffinityFilter. The
    wrong class lead to a wrong display on
    http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/devref/filter_scheduler.html
    
    Change-Id: I690a60cb70eab4837544ddd0bff6f1264e639592
    Closes-Bug: #1360375
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
